EmailTemplate.name: 2020_EMEAI_ATR_UVCleaning_Webinar.Sorry-We-Missed-You_July-16
EmailTemplate.subject: Sorry we missed you!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Did you miss our Cleaner Air Travel - UV Lighting Webinar? Sorry we missed you, {{lead.First Name:default=customer}}!
Since you couldn’t make our Cleaner Air Travel - UV Lighting Webinar, it’s now on-demand <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/7BdPWPqLz3uUFHb31L2ZdY?]]>, should you like to view it. Please use code 123456.
Stay in the loop with us and you’ll be among the first to learn about upcoming webinars, events, product launches and more. Sign up here <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/forms/subscription-page]]>.
We look forward to seeing you next time!
Thank you, Honeywell Aerospace WATCH NOW <[[https://watch.honeywell.com/watch/7BdPWPqLz3uUFHb31L2ZdY?]]>
